Title: She Gets Revenge
Writer: Ryan Murphy (created by), Brad Falchuk (created by), James Wong, John J. Gray (executive story editor), Crystal Liu (story editor)
Actors: Kathy Bates, Sarah Paulson, Evan Peters, Wes Bentley
Plot: Alex enlists John's help in containing an outbreak; Donovan learns The Countess' true intentions; Liz and Iris plan to leave the hotel for good.
